Posts.Title: To those of you just diagnosed... nanadeb nanadeb

Posts.Content: Aug 4, 2011 11:11AM CML0310 wrote: Shingles are nasty.  My mom had a major bout with them when she was battling lung cancer...unknowingly  I will add.  Fortunately I didt need chemo or rads,  but the thought of shingles makes me cringe.  I thought they only gave the vaccine if you were 50+ in which case I can't get it.  Any ideas? Also I know of a few people 30-40s whi have gotten mild bouts of shingles who are completely healthy.  Severe stress alone can bring them on as well!
